archiefmat.scope: Contains secret correspondence and related resolutions taken by the governor, regarding sensitive information on military and civil personnel, healthcare, taxes, judicial questions, military information etc.
archiefmat.notes:
Years: July 1840; 1842-1843; January 1845; November-December 1848; 1849-1858; 1860; 1864-1865; 1869.

The complete series up to 1951 consists of 26 packs and 10 folders.

The numbers of the inventory items may be changed (November 2008).
archiefmat.Aantekeningen: NB de nummering kan mogelijk nog wijzigen; het archief wordt op dit moment (november 2008) omgenummerd. Later nazien!
